chat: TTao: Problem: (unset). Let's keep it green and simple.
Thread Sovereign: One reversible step (Win: frozen:pass)
Faultline Seeker: Try 60s trace on path A (Stop: timeout or signal)
Prism Magus: Swap method X→Y (Keep when no regressions)
Web Cartographer: Name seam + smallest adapter

Help: Ask anything. Controls — tone=casual|formal, rounds=1|2, --strict, --council, --provider

, --counsel-file | --counsel-stdin, seed=. Private: sovereign decide | prism plan. Edit BOARD.current.txt to steer.

exploit.persona: I cut indecision; we move one safe step.

explore.persona: I probe the crack that breaks assumptions fastest.

pivot.persona: I change the path, not the goal; I turn complicated into constrained.

reorient.persona: I reveal the map so we can choose a better path.
